publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-452 Ms Margo MacDonald: Cannabis and the Scottish Criminal Justice System—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive, in consultation with the Parliament, to establish a Commission of experts and lay persons to examine and report on social and medical factors which might require changes to be made to Scots Law and the working of the Scottish criminal justice system in relation to the use of cannabis in Scotland.
S1M-452 Cannabis and the Scottish Criminal Justice System (lodged on 21 January 2000) Alasdair Morgan*
S1M-452 Cannabis and the Scottish Criminal Justice System (lodged on 21 January 2000) Alex Neil*
